import React,{useEffect} from "react"; import './Cart.scss' function Cart(props){ useEffect(()=>{ if(props.sess.user) { var data = {email:props.sess.user.email} // var body = {"email": props.sess.user.email} fetch('http://localhost:3001/cartData',{ method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(data), headers: { "Content-type": "application/json; charset=UTF-8", }, credentials: "include", }) .then(res => res.json()) .then( (result) => { // console.log(result) // cartCount = result; console.log(result) } ) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); })} },[]) return ( <>
